name: subject-search-sitemap-tools
description: Static course pages generator with SEO optimization for all colleges

scripts.build:all: npm run extract:firebase && npm run update:sitemap-all
scripts.build:computing: npm run generate:courses && npm run update:sitemap
scripts.build:colleges: npm run extract:firebase && npm run update:sitemap-all
scripts.build:from-json: npm run generate:from-json && npm run update:sitemap-all
scripts.build:from-course-data: npm run generate:from-course-data && npm run update:sitemap-all
scripts.build:from-index: npm run generate:from-index && npm run update:sitemap

author: Saudi Electronic University - All Colleges
